Instruction: Set the oven temperature to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) before starting.

Blend cornstarch and white sugar in a medium bowl. Cream the mixture with butter. Add eggs one at a time, blending thoroughly. Combine flour and baking powder and mix into the sugar mixture to form a dough. Roll out the dough on a lightly floured surface, cut with cookie cutters, and place on an ungreased baking sheet.

Bake in the preheated oven for 8 to 10 minutes, or until the edges of the cookies turn golden brown. Let the cookies cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.
